txt.en: 'King Elessar waits for you in the throne room.'
DNT - Blah!
DNT - Blah!

'When first you pledged to adventure in Mordor on behalf of Gondor, I knew you would perform great deeds in service of the kingdom. It was not far-seeing on my part. No, I knew from your past adventures that your future deeds would be extraordinary, and so they were!\n\n'You are a true friend of Gondor, [placeholder]. Go with my good wishes, and face evil wherever it rises!'
King Elessar is in his throne room atop Minas Tirith.
DNT - Blah!

'It is time. Let us go at once, and see what we will see.'

<rgb=#FF0000>This is a Solo quest and cannot be completed with a Fellowship.</rgb>
You have pledged to lend your aid and your adventuring skills to Elessar and the Kingdom of Gondor, and to fight on their behalf in Mordor.
King Elessar is in his throne room atop Minas Tirith.
Talk to King Elessar in his throne room
'I am about to return and report to King Elessar of our campaign in Mordor. You should do so as well, [placeholder].'
Talk to King Elessar and attend the ceremony

'I am about to return and report to King Elessar of our campaign in Mordor. You should do so as well, [placeholder].'
'King Elessar waits for you in the throne room.'

'It is good to see you returned hale and hearty, [placeholder]. We will soon conduct an important ceremony, and I will be pleased to have you in attendance. Speak to me when you are ready and we will go together.'
Chapter 7: A True Friend of Gondor
